name: The Solar Policy
description:
The Solar Policy is (the beginning) of a game made for #cyberpunkjam2. Taking in the genre of solarpunk versus cyberpunk, Chapter One of The Solar Policy follows you as you begin an adventure in the year 2151.

To play the game you simply have to investigate what's on your screen. Look at and Read everything you can, something may be necessary in order for you to progress the story. On the load screen, under Options, you can customize the speed of how the text in-game will load. If you run into any bugs feel free to contact me either through itch.io or @hologramvron on twitter, as well as the programmer @sleepiestkitten.

All feedback is welcome, as are donations. Thank you!
